pr_title: Fix Spring Cloud Kubernetes running locally

timeline.message:
Fix Spring Cloud Kubernetes running locally

Signed-off-by: Steven Sheehy <steven.sheehy@hedera.com>

timeline.bodyText:
q:  Is there a way to identify this importer or would we defer to the console identifier?
i.e could this be log.info("Starting {} as follower", name);
timeline.author: Nana-EC

replies.bodyText: We know which importer it is because the logs are from a specific pod like mirror-importer-0
replies.author: steven-sheehy
